abstract.para: This chapter contains basic information about installing and upgrading the &hpcm; for &sles;.

sect1.title: Installing &sles; &hpcm; &productnumber;
sect1.para: In addition to the default &sles; modules, make sure the following modules are also enabled:
Use either the Text Mode or Minimal system role.

sect1.title: Upgrading to &sles; &hpcm; &productnumber;
sect1.para: In version 15 SP6, &slehpc; (&slehpca;) was removed as a separate product, and is now available as the &hpcm; for &sles; (&slsa;).
You can upgrade from &slehpca; &prev-version; to &slsa; &productnumber; plus the &hpcm;.
